title: Tim Moore (North Carolina politician)
added: Moore has been the subject of numerous investigations for corruption and misuse of his office for personal gain. In 2015, the FBI opened an inquiry into mysterious unitemized charges on his campaign finance reports.<ref>[https://www.charlotteobserver.com/news/politics-government/article52487800.html FBI to probe top House Republicans after WBTV investigation]</ref> In 2019, Moore's aides improperly intervened with the state Department of Environmental Quality (DEQ) to benefit a property Moore owned.<ref>[https://campaignforaccountability.org/watchdog-again-calls-for-investigation-of-house-speaker-tim-moore-for-seeking-preferential-treatment-from-state-agency/ Watchdog Again Calls for Investigation of House Speaker Tim Moore for Seeking Preferential Treatment from State Agency]</ref> Moore and his business partners soon sold that very property to Mountaire Farms, an Arkansas-based poultry conglomerate that is a major donor to North Carolina Republicans, for a 650% profit.<ref>[https://medium.com/@longleafpineslate/chickens-in-raleigh-e365d9900272 Chickens in Raleigh]</ref>
